room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Shipwrecked in New York
review: My son and I went to shipwrecked’s escape rooms today for a mid winter recess mom and son date! It was a blast. Everyone was so helpful to us and worked hard to make sure we had a wonderful time. We have usually visited to play putt putt and love it. Now we’re huge fans of the escape rooms rooms. Thank you shipwrecked for taking great care of Brooklyn!!!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Shipwrecked in New York
review: I Have been to the mini golf before and came in on a Monday night to come play mini golf again because it is a great place to have a fun time indoors when it's cold or rainy. Since the last time I was here they have added an whole floor of an escape room with 3 different escape rooms you can choose from. Me and my boyfriend did the haunted escape room it's called a mini escape because the rooms are smaller than a regular escape room and you are given 25 mins to complete the escape. We did not solve all the clues in time but it was still a fun experience. You can go with a group of people and split the cost but for 25 mins it was 40 dollars so if you are just going with two people it is a little pricey. I will definitely be coming back with a bigger group of people will be even more fun trying out a different room with more people.
